text:
P.S. I’m moving ahead as if this is a new beginning. I’m doing just as she said, taking the hit, and focusing on the future. No “explaining my side”. I’ll
be the bad guy for our greater good. I just want to be happy again and give the kids what they really need to thrive (and that goes for you too. I really
still love you!)
Message 1893 of 4024
My thoughts are we re start time with Adrian with overnights every other week.
This Friday both he and Max are off. I was invited to a birthday party and could bring kids but option is you have Adrian Friday plus overnight
through Saturday and drop off evening Saturday. I have him for ski Sunday.
Max has robotics competition Saturday which I planned to attend in afternoon after Adrian basketball.
Sent:03/06/2024 at 05:15 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 03/06/2024 at 05:46 AM)
Subject:Re: AD and The Plan
Message 1894 of 4024
Thanks... what about today? It’s our 1/2 day.
Sent:03/06/2024 at 05:49 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/06/2024 at 05:58 AM)
Subject:Re: AD and The Plan
Message 1895 of 4024
I had scheduled tutoring for him with Ms Nora as he had asked for it.
Is that a yes for plans this Friday/Saturday?
Sent:03/06/2024 at 06:00 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 03/06/2024 at 06:03 AM)
Subject:Re: AD and The Plan
Message 1896 of 4024
Is that a no for Wednesday? So two days a month?
Sent:03/06/2024 at 06:04 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/06/2024 at 06:13 AM)
Subject:Re: AD and The Plan
Message 1897 of 4024
Phase 1 was every other weekend that you have him with an overnight, so Saturday to Sunday. We are in a situation where he has 3 more Sundays for
ski. This week it would be equivalent as you would have Friday and Saturday.
Sent:03/06/2024 at 06:19 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 03/06/2024 at 06:40 AM)
Subject:Re: AD and The Plan
